data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tourinho, Ana Lúcia, Pinto-Da-Rocha, Ricardo, Bragagnolo, Cibele (2015): Taxonomic notes on Holcobunus Roewer, 1910, with descriptions of three new species, and new records for Holcobunus nigripalpis Roewer, 1910 (Opiliones: Eupnoi: Sclerosomatidae). Zootaxa 4027 (3): 425-436, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4027.3.6
